briefTitle: Coagulopathy of COVID-19: A Pragmatic Randomized Controlled Trial of Therapeutic Anticoagulation Versus Standard Care

outcomeMeasures.title: Composite Outcome of ICU Admission, Non-invasive Positive Pressure Ventilation, Invasive Mechanical Ventilation, or All-cause Death up to 28 Days.
outcomeMeasures.description: Composite outcome of ICU admission, non-invasive positive pressure ventilation, invasive mechanical ventilation, or all-cause death up to 28 days.

outcomeMeasures.title: Composite Outcome of ICU Admission or All-cause Death
outcomeMeasures.description: Composite outcome of ICU admission or all-cause death

outcomeMeasures.title: Composite Outcome of Mechanical Ventilation or All-cause Death
outcomeMeasures.description: Composite outcome of mechanical ventilation or all-cause death

outcomeMeasures.title: Major Bleeding
outcomeMeasures.description: Major bleeding as defined by the ISTH Scientific and Standardization Committee (ISTH-SSC) recommendation

outcomeMeasures.title: Red Blood Cell Transfusion
outcomeMeasures.description: Red Blood Cell transfusion (greater than or equal to 1 unit)

outcomeMeasures.title: Transfusion of Platelets, Frozen Plasma, Prothrombin Complex Concentrate, Cryoprecipiate and/or Fibrinogen Concentrate
outcomeMeasures.description: Transfusion of platelets, frozen plasma, prothrombin complex concentrate, cryoprecipiate and/or fibrinogen concentrate

outcomeMeasures.title: Renal Replacement Therapy
outcomeMeasures.description: Renal replacement therapy defined as continuous renal replacement therapy or intermittent hemodialysis

outcomeMeasures.title: Hospital-free Days Alive up to Day 28
outcomeMeasures.description: Hospital-free days alive up to day 28

outcomeMeasures.title: ICU-free Days Alive up to Day 28
outcomeMeasures.description: ICU-free days alive up to day 28

outcomeMeasures.title: Ventilator-free Days Alive up to Day 28
outcomeMeasures.description: Ventilator-free days alive up to day 28

outcomeMeasures.title: Organ Support-free Days Alive up to Day 28
outcomeMeasures.description: Organ support-free days alive up to day 28

outcomeMeasures.title: Changes in D-dimer
outcomeMeasures.description: Geometric mean ratio defined as ratio of geometric means of D-dimer ratios (D-dimer×ULN) of day 2 ±24 hours post-randomisation, adjusted for baseline geometric means of D-dimer ratios using analysis of covariance.
